headline: Mom | Software Developer | Women Techmaker Ambassador
intro: I am a Software Developer born and raised in AsunciÃ³n, Paraguay,and based in the Bay Area, CA.
shortBio: Hola! Iâ€™m Carmen ðŸ‘‹, a proud Latina Software Developer based in the Bay Area, CA. Driven in agile environments, I have gained my full-stack expertise working in fast-paced start-ups accross Fintech, Health and Wellness, and HR.

I enjoy immerse myself in workshops and seminars focused on personal development in my spare time. I cherish quality time with my son pursuing activities like Lego building, hiking and playing soccer and basketball. When on my own, I indulge in reading, playing piano and/or practicing kickboxing.
bio: Computers and sports battled for my attention growing up. I would often skip my English classes to hit the tennis courts. My love for soccer saw me playing for both of my universities, and I even played field hokey for a couple of years!

As the years went by, my curiosity grew stronger as I watched my oldest brother become increasingly immersed in technology. Before I knew it, I found myself eagerly waiting for him to leave for work or school, so I could secretly play on his computer.

Starting my tech journey in Paraguay was quite the adventure, especially as a woman in a field where you could hardly find any ladies around. Picture this: a traditional Catholic family, my dad's a military engineer, my mom's a dentist, and my brothers are all about engineering, just like dad. Changes were NaN ðŸ˜…

In a place where sticking to traditional gender roles was the norm, me diving into Software Engineering was kind of a big deal. But I was captivated by technology and its potential, so I secretly chased my dream with the help of my super hero Ã‘ate (mi Mami), I studied for a business major at one university as my dad suggested, while surreptitiously studied a computer science-related career at another.

Today, driven by a profound sense of responsibility to understand and navigate the increasingly AI-driven world my child is growing up in, I actively pursue courses to deepen my knowledge of AI and ML to support him and their generation in the challenges of tomorrow. I am bun in the oven!
mojo: I am bun in the oven! My mojo is "Never stop LEARNING because life never stop TEACHING".
